00027 #include <Inventor/fields/SoField.h>
00028 
00029 class SoInput;
00030 class SoOutput;
00031 
00032 class COIN_DLL_API SoMField : public SoField {
00033   typedef SoField inherited;
00034 
00035 public:
00036   virtual ~SoMField();
00037 
00038   static SoType getClassTypeId(void);
00039 
00040   int getNum(void) const;
00041   void setNum(const int num);
00042 
00043   virtual void deleteValues(int start, int num = -1);
00044   virtual void insertSpace(int start, int num);
00045 
00046   SbBool set1(const int index, const char * const valuestring);
00047   void get1(const int index, SbString & valuestring);
00048 
00049   void setIndex(const int index);
00050   SbBool getChangedIndexString(int & index, SbString & valuestring);
00051 
00052   static void initClass(void);
00053 
00054   virtual void enableDeleteValues(void);
00055   virtual SbBool isDeleteValuesEnabled(void);
00056 
00057 protected:
00058   SoMField(void);
00059   virtual void makeRoom(int newnum);
00060 
00061 #ifndef DOXYGEN_SKIP_THIS // Internal methods.
00062   virtual int fieldSizeof(void) const = 0;
00063   virtual void * valuesPtr(void) = 0;
00064   virtual void setValuesPtr(void * ptr) = 0;
00065   virtual void allocValues(int num);
00066 #endif // DOXYGEN_SKIP_THIS
00067 
00068   int num;
00069   int maxNum;
00070   int changedIndex;
00071   SbBool userDataIsUsed;
00072 
00073 private:
00074   virtual void deleteAllValues(void) = 0;
00075   virtual void copyValue(int to, int from) = 0;
00076   virtual SbBool readValue(SoInput * in);
00077   virtual SbBool read1Value(SoInput * in, int idx) = 0;
00078   virtual void writeValue(SoOutput * out) const;
00079   virtual void write1Value(SoOutput * out, int idx) const = 0;
00080   virtual SbBool readBinaryValues(SoInput * in, int num);
00081   virtual void writeBinaryValues(SoOutput * out) const;
00082   virtual int getNumValuesPerLine(void) const;
00083 
00084   static SoType classTypeId;
00085 };
00086 
00087 // inline methods
00088 
00089 inline int
00090 SoMField::getNum(void) const
00091 {
00092   this->evaluate();
00093   return this->num;
00094 }
00095 
00096 inline void 
00097 SoMField::setIndex(const int index)
00098 { 
00099   this->changedIndex = index;
00100   return;
00101 }
